mapper.select: SELECT SUM(price * quantity) from cart where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART(pName, price, quantity, user_id, pnum) VALUES (#{pName}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{user_id}, #{pnum})
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET quantity= #{quantity} WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND num=#{num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND NUM=#{num}
